title: Porcelain Tea Set
description: Delicate porcelain tea set with intricate floral patterns, ideal for tea lovers and special occasions.
includes: Includes teapot, cups, and saucers for a complete tea experience.
careInstructions: Hand wash recommended to preserve the delicate hand-painted designs.

title: Stoneware set
description: Elegant stoneware set with a matte finish, perfect  as a standalone decor piece.
careInstructions: Microwave and dishwasher safe for convenient use.

title: Flower mug
description: Handcrafted pottery made from locally sourced clay, featuring unique designs and glazes.
careInstructions: Hand wash recommended to preserve the unique glazes.

title: Terra Cotta Planters
description: Set of rustic terra cotta planters perfect for adding a touch of Mediterranean charm to your garden or indoor space.
includes: Set of 3 planters in different sizes.
dimensions: Small: 6 inches, Medium: 8 inches, Large: 10 inches
careInstructions: Suitable for indoor and outdoor use. Drainage holes included.

title: Architectural Ceramic set
description: Hand-painted ceramic set suitable for kitchens.
includes: Set of 3 kitchen canisters with lids.
dimensions: Canister 1: 8 inches tall, Canister 2: 7 inches tall, Canister 3: 6 inches tall

title: Home Decor Set
description: Set of decorative pottery items including bowls perfect for enhancing your home decor.
dimensions: Large Bowl: 10 inches diameter, Small Bowl: 8 inches diameter
careInstructions: Decorative use only. Not suitable for food consumption.
